name: Reply to Consumer Complaint Notice
description: Reply to consumer complaint defending quality of product/service
body: Subject: Reply to your notice dated {{notice_date}} regarding {{product_service}}
This has reference to your notice dated {{notice_date}} alleging deficiency in service/defect in product regarding {{product_service}}.
2. {{company_name}} categorically denies any deficiency in service or defect in the product supplied/service rendered.

body.text: 4. The product/service provided complies with all applicable quality standards and specifications, specifically {{quality_compliance}}.

body: 5. Your complaint is misconceived, exaggerated, and unsustainable. There has been no deficiency in service or unfair trade practice on the part of {{company_name}}.
6. {{company_name}} has at all times acted in good faith and in accordance with applicable laws, regulations, and industry standards.

body.text: 7. Without prejudice to the above and purely on humanitarian grounds, {{company_name}} is willing to {{offer_made}}.

body: 8. This reply is issued without prejudice to all rights and defenses available to {{company_name}} under law.
You are requested to reconsider your complaint in light of the above facts.
